name: Lotus Trilogy
overview: This collection features the whole trilogy: - Lotus Esprit Turbo Challenge - Lotus Turbo Challenge 2 - Lotus 3: The Ultimate Challenge The first game features lap-based racing against 19 other cars. The second game involves driving to checkpoints against the clock, with 8 distinct settings and a full screen single-player mode. The third game adds the RECS course creator, and combines lap-based racing and checkpoint-based racing from the original, with 5 new settings.
